parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Custom Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Obtains custom radio channel's details, set by [[radioChannelCreate]].

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[radioChannelInfo]] customChannelID

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> customChannelID: [[Number]] - [[Channel IDs|custom channel ID]] returned by [[radioChannelCreate]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] to format  [colour, label, callSign, units, sentenceType, exists] (see [[radioChannelCreate]])

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _channelID = [[radioChannelCreate]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[1, 0, 0.5, 0.8], "Q-dance Radio", "%UNIT_NAME", [u1, u2], [[false]]];
[[radioChannelInfo]] _channelID; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[1,0,0.5,0.8], "Q-dance Radio", "%UNIT_NAME", [u1, u2], [[false]], [[true]]]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[radioChannelCreate]] [[getPlayerChannel]]
</value></part></template></root>
